remarks: Characterize a quatary relationship over a tail Cartesian product. Together with ~ pprodss4v , this completely defines membership in a parallel product.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Apr-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement:
brpprod.1 $e |- X e. _V $.
brpprod.2 $e |- Y e. _V $.
brpprod.3 $e |- Z e. _V $.
brpprod.4 $e |- W e. _V $.
brpprod $p |- ( <. X , Y >. pprod ( A , B ) <. Z , W >. <-> ( X A Z /\ Y B W ) ) $.
